location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has slightly obscured the address of the letter. However, the identity of the intended recipient remains clear.

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying the Resident's opinion that he cannot be held to blame for correspondence being late, if he is not provided with the means to send it out punctually.
